name: BHSS Athletics
description:
Add and follow us on twitter to stay up to date on all Bill Hogarth Secondary School Athletics tryout information and game results! Lets Go Hornets!

Sports clubs offered:
- Golf
- Girls rugby
- Boys rugby
- Cross country
- Tennis
- Cricket
- Volleyball
- Basketball
- Hockey
- Curling
- Soccer
- Flag football
- Ultimate frisbee
- Baseball
- Rock climbing
- Track n field

name: Specialist High Skills Majors (SHSM)
description: SHSM's for careers in Buisness, Health & Wellness and Info & Communication Technology. Specialist High Skills Majors let students focus on a career path that matches their skills and interests while meeting the requirements of the Ontario Secondary School Diploma (OSSD)
how_to:
Individual requirements for those interested in Health & Wellness and Buisness careers are on the club website!

name: Model United Nations (MUN)
description: Model UN is a simulation of the UN General Assembly and its other multilateral bodies where students perform an ambassador role while debating topics such as gender equality, climate action, global health, and more

description: The club responsible for creating and posting daily announcements at BHSS!

name: Bullet Journal Club (BUJO)
description: A club dedicated to teaching good journaling, writing and doodling techniques such as calligraphy

name: Distributive Education Clubs of America (DECA)
description: DECA's flagship evaluation process involves students in both a written component such as an exam or report and an interactive component with an industry professional serving as a judge. DECA's competitive events directly contribute to every student being college and career ready when they graduate from high school.
events: Upcoming events can be found at https://twitter.com/bhssdeca?lang=en
